For most chords, keep your ring finger and pinky on the B and high E strings
In the bridge, on the words 'revolution, 'had' and 'summertimes' slide your first finger to the first fret on
on the same string.
After the last two Cadd9 chords, when there is a * slide your first finger to the first fret again.

sounding out of pitch.

content.text:
House of the Rising Sun - The Animals 

Tab by Nathan Lambert, based on the tab by Chayes.

I made the tab more compact so I could see the lyrics better, but I left the
intro chords as an example of the picking pattern. The *'s are where you should
be keeping time somehow! In the comments section of another tab, some people said
they were having trouble with the "extra" notes, so I put those in parentheses ().
Playing them does sound more like the song, but people probably won't notice if
you leave them out ;)  I also fixed how the chords lined up with the lyrics to
something that makes more sense to me. Hope this helps someone. Cheers!

Standard tuning
No capo
